subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In his ruling on the Saints’ bounty scandal, the former N.F.L. commissioner Paul Tagliabue created a nuanced decision that offered a chance for everyone to claim at least a portion of victory.
snippet: In his ruling on the Saints’ bounty scandal, the former N.F.L. commissioner Paul Tagliabue created a nuanced decision that offered a chance for everyone to claim at least a portion of victory.
